name: apply_partial_message_update
description:
Updates an existing message resource using the PATCH method.

This method updates the fields of a Chat message identified by its resource
name. It supports partial updates via the `updateMask` parameter. If the message
is not found and `allowMissing` is True, a new message is created (requires a
client-assigned message ID).

message_to_patch_identifier.description:
Required. Resource name of the message to update.
Format: `spaces/{space}/messages/{message}`.
Examples:
- `spaces/AAA/messages/BBB.CCC`
- `spaces/AAA/messages/client-custom-name`
See: https://developers.google.com/workspace/chat/create-messages#name_a_created_message

patch_field_mask.description:
Required. Comma-separated list of fields to update, or `*` for all.
Supported values include:
- `text`
- `attachment`
- `cards`
- `cards_v2`
- `accessory_widgets`

enable_upsert_behavior.description:
Optional. If True, creates the message if not found (requires a
client-assigned ID). Ignores `updateMask` in that case.

cards.description: List of cards to include in the message.

attachment.description: Attachments such as files or media.

annotations.description: Annotations like user mentions, rich links, etc.

clientAssignedMessageId.description: Optional custom ID to identify the message.

message_patch_data.description:
A dictionary representing the fields of the message to update.
Possible keys include:

name: check_user_thread_read_status
description: Retrieves the read state of a user within a thread.

user_thread_read_state_identifier.description:
Required. Resource name of the thread read state to retrieve.
Only supports getting read state for the calling user.
To refer to the calling user, set one of the following:
- The `me` alias. For example: users/me/spaces/{space}/threads/{thread}/threadReadState
- Their Workspace email address. For example: users/user@example.com/spaces/{space}/threads/{thread}/threadReadState
- Their user ID. For example: users/123456789/spaces/{space}/threads/{thread}/threadReadState
Format: users/{user}/spaces/{space}/threads/{thread}/threadReadState

name: create_space_membership
description: Creates a membership for a user or group in the specified Chat space.

destination_space_id.description:
Required. The resource name of the space.
Format: spaces/{space}

isAnonymous.description: Optional. True if the user is deleted or profile is hidden.

new_membership_data.description: Required. Represents the membership to be created, with the following fields:

with_administrator_rights.description:
If True, uses administrator privileges.
Admin access cannot be used to create memberships for bots or users outside the domain.

name: create_space_with_members
description: Sets up a Chat space and adds initial members.

space_initialization_request.description: Request body with the following fields:

name: delete_space_membership
description: Deletes a membership from a space.

membership_to_delete_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the membership to delete.
Format: spaces/{space}/members/{member}
Example values:
- spaces/AAA/members/user@example.com
- spaces/AAA/members/app

use_admin_permissions.description:
Optional. If True, uses Workspace admin privileges.
Note: Deleting app memberships using admin access is not supported.

name: edit_existing_message
description: Updates a message in a Google Chat space or creates a new one if allowed.

message_to_update_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the message to update. Format:
`spaces/{space}/messages/{message}`. If using a client-assigned ID,
use `spaces/{space}/messages/client-{custom_id}`.

fields_to_change_mask.description:
Required. Comma-separated list of fields to update. Use `"*"` to update all fields.
Valid fields: "text", "attachment", "cards", "cards_v2", "accessory_widgets".

create_if_nonexistent.description:
Optional. If True and the message is not found, creates a new message
(only allowed with a client-assigned message ID).

updated_message_content.description: Required. The message fields to apply updates to. May include any of the following keys:

accessoryWidgets.description: Interactive widgets shown below the message.

name: enumerate_member_spaces
description: Lists spaces the current user is a member of, with optional filtering and pagination.

page_limit.description:
Max number of spaces to return (default 100, max 1000).
Must be between 1 and 1000 if provided.

space_type_filter_query.description:
Filter by space type using 'OR' operator only, no 'AND' operator is allowed. Example:
'spaceType = "SPACE" OR spaceType = "GROUP_CHAT"'.
Allowed values for spaceType:
    - "SPACE"
    - "GROUP_CHAT"
    - "DIRECT_MESSAGE"

name: fetch_attachment_metadata
description: Retrieves attachment metadata by its resource name.

attachment_resource_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the attachment.
Format: "spaces/{space}/messages/{message}/attachments/{attachment}"

name: fetch_media_content
description: Downloads media using the specified resource name.

media_resource_identifier.description:
Name of the media to download.
See ReadRequest.resource_name.

name: fetch_membership_details
description: Retrieves details about a specific membership in a Chat space.

membership_resource_name.description:
Required. The resource name of the membership to retrieve.
Format:
- spaces/{space}/members/{member}
- spaces/{space}/members/app (for the app itself)
You can use an email address as an alias for {member}, e.g., spaces/{space}/members/user@example.com.

as_admin_user.description:
If True, runs with the caller's Workspace admin privileges.
Note: App memberships (i.e., .../members/app) cannot be fetched with admin access.

name: fetch_message_history
description:
Lists messages in a space where the caller is a member.

The space is identified by `parent`, e.g., "spaces/AAA". The caller must be a member of the specified space to retrieve messages.

source_space_name.description: Required. The resource name of the space to list messages from. Format: `spaces/{space}`.

message_batch_size.description: The maximum number of messages to return. Defaults to 25 if unspecified. Maximum is 1000. Negative values raise an error.

history_pagination_token.description: Token for fetching the next page of results. Should be passed unchanged to retrieve paginated data.

message_filter_query.description:
A query string for filtering messages by `create_time` and/or `thread.name`. Examples:
- create_time > "2023-04-21T11:30:00-04:00"
- create_time > "2023-04-21T11:30:00-04:00" AND thread.name = spaces/AAA/threads/123

message_sort_order.description:
Order of the returned messages. Valid values:
- "createTime desc": Sort by createTime in descending order (newest first)
- "createTime asc": Sort by createTime in ascending order (oldest first)
Defaults to "createTime desc" if unspecified.

include_deleted_messages.description: Whether to include deleted messages. If False, messages with `deleteTime` are excluded.

name: fetch_user_space_read_status
description: Retrieves the read state of a user within a space.

read_state_resource_path.description:
Required. Resource name of the space read state to retrieve.
Only supports getting read state for the calling user.
To refer to the calling user, set one of the following:
- The `me` alias. For example, `users/me/spaces/{space}/spaceReadState`.
- Their Workspace email address. For example, `users/user@example.com/spaces/{space}/spaceReadState`.
- Their user ID. For example, `users/123456789/spaces/{space}/spaceReadState`.
Format: users/{user}/spaces/{space}/spaceReadState

name: find_organization_spaces_as_admin
description:
Searches for Chat spaces in a Google Workspace organization using administrator access.

Supported fields in the query include:
- display_name: Uses the HAS (`:`) operator.
- external_user_allowed: Accepts "true" or "false".
- create_time, last_active_time: Accepts `=`, `<`, `>`, `<=`, `>=` with timestamps in RFC-3339 format.
- space_history_state: Accepts specific enum values.
- space_type: Only "SPACE" is allowed (required).
- customer: Must be "customers/my_customer" (required).

require_admin_privileges.description:
Required. Must be `True`. Enables administrator-only
access. Requires admin scopes such as:
- `chat.admin.spaces.readonly`
- `chat.admin.spaces`

search_result_limit.description:
The maximum number of spaces to return. If unspecified,
up to 100 spaces are returned. Maximum allowed value is 1000. Values greater
than 1000 are capped at 1000. Negative values are ignored and default to 100.

search_pagination_token.description:
A token received from a previous search call.
Used for pagination; represents an offset.

space_filter_expression.description:
Required. A query string combining fields using the `AND` operator.
Required conditions:
    - customer = "customers/my_customer"
    - space_type = "SPACE"
Supported query fields:
    - display_name: e.g., `display_name:"hello world"`
    - create_time: e.g., `create_time >= "2022-01-01T00:00:00Z"`
    - last_active_time: e.g., `last_active_time < "2024-12-01T00:00:00Z"`
    - external_user_allowed: "true" or "false"
    - space_history_state: One of the enum values below
Operators:
    - Allowed: `=`, `<`, `>`, `<=`, `>=`, `:`
    - Only `AND` is supported between conditions

sort_order_specification.description:
Specifies result ordering. Format:
`field ASC|DESC`. Supported fields:
- `membership_count.joined_direct_human_user_count`
- `last_active_time`
- `create_time`
Default is `create_time ASC`.

name: get_all_reactions_for_message
description: Lists reactions to a message.

target_message_resource_name.description:
Required. The resource name of the message to list reactions for.
Format: "spaces/{space}/messages/{message}"

max_reactions_to_return.description:
Optional. Maximum number of reactions to return. Defaults to 25.
Maximum value is 200.

reactions_page_token.description: Optional. Token from a previous list call to retrieve the next page.

reaction_filter_criteria.description:
Optional. Filter reactions by emoji or user fields. Examples:
- emoji.unicode = "üôÇ"
- emoji.custom_emoji.uid = "XYZ"
- user.name = "users/USER123"
- (emoji.unicode = "üôÇ" OR emoji.unicode = "üëç") AND user.name = "users/USER123"

name: get_all_space_memberships
description: Lists memberships in a space.

space_identifier.description:
Required. The resource name of the space to list memberships for.
Format: spaces/{space}

max_results_per_page.description:
Maximum number of memberships to return.
If unspecified, at most 100 are returned. Value must be between 1 and 1000, inclusive, if provided.

next_page_cursor.description: Token to retrieve the next page from a previous response.

membership_query_filter.description:
Query filter string to filter memberships by:
- role = "ROLE_MEMBER" or "ROLE_MANAGER"
- member.type = "HUMAN" or "BOT"
You may also use:
- member.type != "BOT"
- AND/OR operators (restrictions apply)
If 'useAdminAccess' is True and a filter is provided, the filter must include
a condition on 'member.type' (e.g., 'member.type = "HUMAN"' or 'member.type != "BOT"').

include_group_memberships.description: If True, includes memberships associated with Google Groups.

include_invited_members.description: If True, includes memberships in the INVITED state.

enable_admin_privileges.description: If True, enables admin privileges for the listing operation.

name: get_history_of_space_events
description:
Lists space events for a specified Google Chat space.

Retrieves event records such as message creations, updates, deletions, membership changes,
reactions, and space updates in a specific Google Chat space. Filtering supports event types,
as well as time-based queries. Pagination is also supported.

target_space_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the Google Chat space.
Format: `spaces/{space}`.

event_query_string.description:
Required. A query string to filter events.
Must include at least one `event_type` using the `:` operator.
Can also include `start_time` and `end_time` in RFC-3339 format.
Example valid filter:
    start_time="2023-08-23T19:20:33+00:00" AND event_types:"google.workspace.chat.message.v1.created"

event_batch_size.description: Maximum number of events to return. If not set, the service defaults.

pagination_token_for_events.description: Token to retrieve the next page of results.

name: get_user_notification_preferences
description: Retrieves the space notification setting for a user.

user_space_notification_settings_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the space notification setting to retrieve.
Only supports the calling user's identifier.
Format:
- users/me/spaces/{space}/spaceNotificationSetting
- users/user@example.com/spaces/{space}/spaceNotificationSetting
- users/123456789/spaces/{space}/spaceNotificationSetting

name: modify_existing_membership
description: Updates a membership.

target_membership_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the membership to update.
Format: spaces/{space}/members/{member}

fields_to_modify.description:
Required. Comma-separated list of fields to update.
Supported values:
- 'role'

name.description:
Resource name of the membership.
    Format: spaces/{space}/members/{member}

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the membership was created.

deleteTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the membership was deleted.

displayName.description: Output only. Display name of the user.

isAnonymous.description: Output only. True if user is deleted or hidden.

member.description: Member details with the following structure:

groupMember.description: Optional group information with the following structure:

updated_membership_payload.description: Dictionary containing the updated membership fields. Supported structure:

perform_as_admin.description: If True, runs the method using administrator privileges.

name: modify_space_attributes
description: Updates a Chat space.

target_space_to_update.description: Required. Resource name of the space. Format: "spaces/{space}".

fields_to_modify_mask.description:
Required. Comma-separated list of field paths to update, or "*" to update all supported:
- "space_details"
- "display_name"
- "space_type"
- "space_history_state"
- "access_settings.audience"
- "permission_settings"

updated_space_data.description: Space object with updated field values.

with_admin_permissions.description: Run as admin. Some update masks are restricted.

name: post_new_message
description:
Creates a message in a space.

The space is identified by `parent`, for example, "spaces/AAA". The caller must be a member
of "spaces/{space}/members/{CURRENT_USER_ID}" to create a message.

destination_space_name.description:
Required. Resource name of the space to create the message in.
Format: "spaces/{space}".

thread.description: Thread information based on ThreadDetailInput model:

driveFileId.description: ID of the file in Google Drive.

attachment.description: List of message attachments (defaults to empty list):

message_content_data.description:
Required. A dictionary representing the message resource object. Based on the
MessageBodyInput model, the following core fields are supported:

message_idempotency_token.description:
A unique ID for the message request. If reused by the same user,
the same message is returned. If reused incorrectly, results in a conflict and returns an
empty dictionary.

threading_behavior.description:
Controls whether the message starts a new thread or replies
to an existing one. Valid values:
- 'MESSAGE_REPLY_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED': Default behavior
- 'REPLY_MESSAGE_FALLBACK_TO_NEW_THREAD': Reply to existing thread if specified, otherwise create new thread
- 'REPLY_MESSAGE_OR_FAIL': Reply to existing thread if specified, otherwise fail
- 'NEW_THREAD': Always create a new thread

client_assigned_identifier.description:
A custom ID that must start with "client-". Included in the message's
resource name if provided.

name: provision_new_space
description: Creates a Chat space.

idempotency_key.description: Unique ID for request. If reused, returns existing space.

new_space_definition.description:
Space resource to create. Expected structure defined by SpaceInputModel.
Required fields include:

displayName.description: Required and cannot be empty if spaceType is "SPACE".

name: react_to_message
description: Creates a reaction and adds it to a message.

message_resource_to_react_to.description:
Required. Resource name of the message to which the reaction is added.
Format: "spaces/{space}/messages/{message}"

reaction_details_to_add.description: Required. The Reaction resource to create with fields:

unicode.description: Optional. A basic emoji represented by a unicode string.

uid.description: Output only. Unique key for the custom emoji.

emojiName.description: Optional. User-defined emoji name, must be valid format.

isAnonymous.description: Output only. True if user is deleted or hidden.

name: remove_chat_message
description: Deletes a message.

message_to_delete_id.description:
Required. Resource name of the message.
Format: `spaces/{space}/messages/{message}`.
If you've set a custom ID for your message, you can use the value from
the `clientAssignedMessageId` field for `{message}`. For details, see
https://developers.google.com/workspace/chat/create-messages#name_a_created_message

delete_with_replies.description:
When `true`, deleting a message also deletes its threaded
replies. When `false`, if the message has threaded replies, deletion fails.
Only applies when authenticating as a user. Has no effect when authenticating
as a Chat app.

name: remove_reaction_from_message
description: Deletes a reaction by its resource name.

reaction_resource_to_delete.description:
Required. The resource name of the reaction to delete.
Format: "spaces/{space}/messages/{message}/reactions/{reaction}"

name: remove_space_and_contents
description: Deletes a Chat space and all its child resources.

space_identifier_for_deletion.description: Required. Resource name of the space. Format: "spaces/{space}".

admin_delete_override.description: When True, allows deletion without membership check.

name: retrieve_single_message
description:
Returns details about a message by name.

The `name` should follow the format: "spaces/{space}/messages/{message}".
This function performs the following steps:
    1. Parses the space portion from the name.
    2. Checks if the current user is a member of the space.
    3. Finds the message in DB["Message"].
    4. Returns the message if found and authorized, else returns {}.

message_resource_identifier.description:
Required. Resource name of the message.
Format: "spaces/{space}/messages/{message}" or
"spaces/{space}/messages/client-custom-id".

name: retrieve_space_information
description: Returns details of a Chat space by resource name.

space_resource_name.description: Required. Resource name of the space. Format: "spaces/{space}".

as_administrator.description:
When True, the caller can view any space
as an admin. Otherwise, the user must be a member.

name: retrieve_specific_space_event
description: Retrieves a space event resource by its name.

event_resource_identifier.description:
Required. The resource name of the space event.
Format: `spaces/{space}/spaceEvents/{spaceEvent}`

name: set_user_notification_preferences
description: Updates the space notification setting for a user.

target_notification_settings_resource.description:
Required. Resource name of the space notification setting to update.
Format: users/{user}/spaces/{space}/spaceNotificationSetting

fields_to_update_in_settings.description:
Required. Comma-separated list of fields to update.
Supported fields:
- "notification_setting"
- "mute_setting"

name.description: Resource name of the space notification setting.

new_notification_settings_payload.description: A dictionary representing the SpaceNotificationSetting resource with the following keys:

name: set_user_space_read_marker
description: Updates a user's space read state.

target_read_state_resource.description:
Resource name of the space read state to update.
Format: users/{user}/spaces/{space}/spaceReadState

read_state_update_mask.description:
Required. Comma-separated list of fields to update.
Currently only "last_read_time" is supported.

name.description:
Resource name of the space read state.
    Format: users/{user}/spaces/{space}/spaceReadState

last_read_time.description:
Optional. The time when the user's space read state was updated.
    This corresponds with either the timestamp of the last read message, or a user-specified timestamp.

new_read_state_data.description: A dictionary representing the SpaceReadState resource with the following key:

name: upload_file_to_chat_space
description: Uploads an attachment to the specified Chat space.

target_space_resource_name.description: Required. Resource name of the Chat space in which the attachment is uploaded. Format "spaces/{space}".
